---

## Props

### Interaction
| Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description |
|------|------|---------|----------|-------------|
| onSelect | any | undefined | No | Callback function triggered when a bubble is selected in the chart. |

### Data Configuration
| Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description |
|------|------|---------|----------|-------------|
| dataset | any | undefined | No | The data source for the bubble chart containing x, y, and size values. |
| xaxisdatakey | string | '' | No | Property name in the dataset to use for x-axis values. |
| yaxisdatakey | string | '' | No | Property name in the dataset to use for y-axis values. |
| bubblesize | string | '' | No | Property name in the dataset that determines the size of each bubble. |

### Chart Layout
| Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description |
|------|------|---------|----------|-------------|
| title | string | '' | No | Main title displayed at the top of the chart. |
| subheading | string | '' | No | Secondary title text displayed below the main title. |
| offsetbottom | number | 50 | No | Bottom margin spacing around the chart area in pixels. |
| offsettop | number | 70 | No | Top margin spacing around the chart area in pixels. |
| offsetleft | number | 65 | No | Left margin spacing around the chart area in pixels. |
| offsetright | number | 25 | No | Right margin spacing around the chart area in pixels. |

### Axis Configuration
| Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description |
|------|------|---------|----------|-------------|
| xaxislabel | string | '' | No | Label text displayed along the x-axis. |
| yaxislabel | string | '' | No | Label text displayed along the y-axis. |
| xunits | string | '' | No | Unit suffix displayed with x-axis values. |
| yunits | string | '' | No | Unit suffix displayed with y-axis values. |
| showxaxis | boolean | true | No | Controls visibility of the x-axis line and ticks. |
| showyaxis | boolean | true | No | Controls visibility of the y-axis line and ticks. |
| showxaxislabels | boolean | true | No | Controls visibility of x-axis tick labels. |
| showyaxislabels | boolean | true | No | Controls visibility of y-axis tick labels. |
| staggerlabels | boolean | false | No | Alternates label positioning to prevent overlap on crowded axes. |
| labelangle | number | 0 | No | Rotation angle in degrees for axis labels to improve readability. |
| autoadjustlabels | boolean | false | No | Automatically adjusts label positioning to prevent overlapping. |

### Axis Positioning
| Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description |
|------|------|---------|----------|-------------|
| yaxislabeldistance | number | undefined | No | Distance in pixels between y-axis and its label text. |
| xaxislabeldistance | number | undefined | No | Distance in pixels between x-axis and its label text. |
| offsetxaxis | number | undefined | No | Positional offset for the entire x-axis from its default location. |
| offsetyaxis | number | undefined | No | Positional offset for the entire y-axis from its default location. |

### Axis Domains and Ticks
| Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description |
|------|------|---------|----------|-------------|
| xdomain | string | 'Min' | No | Determines how x-axis domain bounds are calculated. |
| ydomain | string | 'Min' | No | Determines how y-axis domain bounds are calculated. |
| xtickexpr | (item: any, index: number, length: number) => any | undefined | No | Custom function to format x-axis tick values and labels. |
| ytickexpr | (item: any, index: number, length: number) => any | undefined | No | Custom function to format y-axis tick values and labels. |
| ynumberformat | string | '' | No | Number formatting pattern applied to y-axis tick labels. |

### Visual Styling
| Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description |
|------|------|---------|----------|-------------|
| theme | string | '' | No | Visual theme name that controls the overall chart appearance. |
| customcolors | string \| Array<string> | '' | No | Custom color palette for bubbles, overriding theme defaults. |
| shape | string | '' | No | Shape style applied to bubbles in the chart. |
| iconclass | any | '' | No | CSS class or icon identifier for chart decoration elements. |

### Grid and Background
| Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description |
|------|------|---------|----------|-------------|
| hidegridxaxis | boolean | false | No | Hides vertical grid lines that correspond to x-axis ticks. |
| hidegridyaxis | boolean | false | No | Hides horizontal grid lines that correspond to y-axis ticks. |

### Legend and Labels
| Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description |
|------|------|---------|----------|-------------|
| showlegend | string | 'top' | No | Position of the chart legend ('top', 'bottom', 'left', 'right', or 'none'). |
| legendheight | number | 0 | No | Fixed height allocation for the legend area in pixels. |
| showlabels | 'inside' \| 'outside' \| 'hide' | 'outside' | No | Controls visibility and positioning of data labels on bubbles. |
| labellegendheight | number | 0 | No | Height allocation specifically for label legend area in pixels. |
| labeltype | 'percent' \| 'value' \| 'key-value' \| 'key' | 'percent' | No | Format type for data labels displayed on or near bubbles. |

### Interactive Features
| Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description |
|------|------|---------|----------|-------------|
| tooltips | boolean | true | No | Enables hover tooltips that display detailed bubble information. |
| highlightpoints | boolean | false | No | Visually emphasizes bubbles on hover or selection. |
| showvalues | boolean | false | No | Displays data values directly on the bubbles. |

### Animation and Rendering
| Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description |
|------|------|---------|----------|-------------|
| type | string | '' | No | Chart type identifier used for rendering engine selection. |
| interpolation | string | 'linear' | No | Mathematical interpolation method for smooth transitions and animations. |

### Loading and Empty States
| Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description |
|------|------|---------|----------|-------------|
| loadingicon | any | 'fa fa-circle-o-notch fa-pulse' | No | Icon or CSS class displayed during data loading periods. |
| loadingdatamsg | any | 'Loading...' | No | Text message shown to users while chart data is being fetched. |
| nodatamessage | any | 'No data found' | No | Message displayed when the dataset is empty or unavailable. |

### Accessibility
| Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description |
|------|------|---------|----------|-------------|
| accessibilitylabel | string | undefined | No | Screen reader description for the entire bubble chart component. |
| accessibilityrole | AccessibilityRole | undefined | No | ARIA role that defines the chart's purpose for assistive technologies. |
| hint | string | undefined | No | Additional context or usage hints for accessibility tools. |

### Custom Rendering
| Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description |
|------|------|---------|----------|-------------|
| renderitempartial | (item: any, index: number, partialName: string) => React.ReactNode | undefined | No | Custom render function for specific chart elements or bubble decorations. |

## Methods

| Method | Parameters | Return Type | Description |
|--------|------------|-------------|-------------|
| onSelect | event: any, data: any | void | Programmatically triggers bubble selection with custom event and data parameters. |

## Events

| Event | Parameters | Description |
|-------|------------|-------------|
| onSelect | `event.nativeEvent`, `this.proxy`, `selectedItem`, `selectedChartItem` | Fired when user taps or clicks on a bubble in the chart. |
| onBeforerender | `this.proxy`, `null` | Fired before the chart begins its rendering process, useful for last-minute data preparation. |
| onTransform | `undefined`, `this.proxy` | Fired during chart transformations such as zoom, pan, or data updates. |

## Style Classes

### Default Styling
- `app-bubble-chart` - Base styling class that defines the default appearance and layout for the bubble chart component.
